name: Rebel vs. Zombies BETA
description: Rebel vs. Zombies is an arena based top down shooter game, where you (the rebel), fights "levels" of zombies that get a bit harder as you go. Remember, this is the beta, so there may be bugs. There are 3 levels with 3 different terrains. Developed by Aurora. Please go to our website to check out more stuff: https://bit.ly/aurora-games
